name: Miika Hannula
content: Homepage of Miika HannulaSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationMiika HannulaContact informationVisiting address:Room 3097, Delta CentreNarva Mnt 18, TartuEmail:miika.hannula@ut.eeAssociate Professor at the Institute of Computer Science of the University of Tartu. University Researcher (0.15) at the University of Helsinki.My current research focuses on dependence logic, finite model theory, and database theory.I received my PhD in mathematics at the University of Helsinki in 2015 and worked as a postdoctoral researcher and lecturer at the School of Computer Science of the University of Auckland in 2015-18.Â  In 2022, I received the title of docent in mathematical logic at the University of Helsinki.I am also found on DBLP, Google Scholar, ORCID, and ResearchGate.News: Open PhD position at the University of Tartu on Logics with Semiring Semantics: https://ut.ee/en/content/phd-open-calls (see Computer Science #7; Application period May 1-15)Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
